snippet: Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy pledged to provide “complete transparency” about his own financial assets to refute documents showing that he and others had received regular payouts.
abstract: Spanish Prime Min Mariano Rajoy pledges to provide complete transparency about his own financial assets and those of other politicians in his party, in effort to refute documents showing that he and others had received payouts from secret parallel account maintained by party.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy pledged to provide “complete transparency” about his own financial assets to refute documents showing that he and others had received regular payouts.

headline.main: Spanish Leader Pledges Transparency Amid Corruption Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Spanish Leader Pledges Transparency Amid Corruption Inquiry
